text: Junior Debt Collector, welcome to your first day at Afterlife Debt Collector Agency. Your task is simple - collect a debt from the local inhabitants. They're not big on civilized methods, so get ready for... unconventional negotiations.
Finally! I'm sure we can find common ground with them. Maybe offer an installment plan or alternative payment method? There's always room for compromise!
Your enthusiasm is touching, but illusions are deadly here. These creatures won't listen to your pleas about 'goodwill'. It's time to understand how things really work in this world.
